TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AuthenticatedStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public MustInherit Class AuthenticatedStream Inherits Stream
public ref class AuthenticatedStream abstract : System::IO::Stream

summary.span: 提供通过流传递凭据的方法，以及为客户端/服务器应用程序请求或执行身份验证的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for passing credentials across a stream and requesting or performing authentication for client-server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象类提供经过身份验证的流所共有的方法和属性。This abstract class provides methods and properties that are common to authenticated streams. 经过身份验证的流可以提供身份验证、数据签名和加密服务，从而有助于维护使用传输的数据的完整性和保密性 。Authenticated streams can provide authentication, data signing, and encryption services that can help maintain the integrity and confidentiality of data transmitted using the . 与客户端和服务器上支持的安全协议一起派生的类所实现的安全协议将确定可用于应用程序的安全功能。The security protocol implemented by a class that derives from together with the security protocols supported on the client and server will determine the security features that are available to an application. 和 类 分别继承并实现 Negotiate 和安全套接字层安全协议。The and classes inherit from and implement the Negotiate and Secure Sockets Layer security protocols, respectively. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示已验证流的属性。The following example demonstrates displaying the properties of an authenticated stream. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#6)]

para.span: 必须在派生类中重写以下成员： 、 、 、 和 。

span.span: The following members must be overridden in a derived class: , , , , and .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 为 `leaveStreamOpen` 参数指定，则关闭将对 流不起任何作用 `innerStream` 。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream. 为经过身份验证的流的实现者提供此构造函数，并且只能由派生自的类调用 。This constructor is provided for implementers of authenticated streams, and can be called only by classes that are derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask DisposeAsync() cil managed
Public Overrides Function DisposeAsync () As ValueTask

summary.span: 异步释放 使用的非托管资源和受管理资源。

span.span: Asynchronously releases the unmanaged and managed resources used by the .

returns.span: 一个表示异步释放操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。This method allows performing resource-intensive dispose operations without blocking the main thread. 如果为，则此方法还会释放内部流 `false` ; 否则，只刷新内部流。This method also disposes the inner stream when is `false`; otherwise, the inner stream is just flushed. 调用 `DisposeAsync` 会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源 。Calling `DisposeAsync` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示身份验证是否成功。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether authentication was successful.

value.span: 如果身份验证成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于执行身份验证的方法在从继承的类中定义 。The methods called to perform authentication are defined in the classes that inherit from . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsEncrypted As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsEncrypted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示使用此 发送的数据是否加密。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether data sent using this is encrypted.

value.span: 如果在通过网络传输数据前将其加密，并在数据到达远程终结点后将其解密，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密有助于保护数据的隐私;也就是说，它有助于确保在数据传输过程中，第三方无法对数据进行解密。Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsMutuallyAuthenticated As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsMutuallyAuthenticated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示服务器和客户端是否均已进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.

value.span: 如果客户端和服务器都已经过身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client and server have been authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有安全协议都支持相互身份验证。Not all security protocols support mutual authentication. 若要确定在继承自的类中实现的安全协议是否支持相互身份验证 ，请查看类文档。To determine whether mutual authentication is supported by the security protocol implemented in a class that inherits from , check the class documentation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsServer As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsServer { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示连接的本地端是否已作为服务器经过了身份验证。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the local side of the connection was authenticated as the server.

value.span: 如果本地终结点作为经过身份验证的客户端/服务器连接的服务器端进行了身份验证，则为 ；如果本地终结点作为客户端进行了身份验证，则为 。

span.span: if the local endpoint was authenticated as the server side of a client-server authenticated connection; if the local endpoint was authenticated as the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数用于客户端-服务器身份验证的安全协议定义根据您是客户端还是服务器来提供身份验证凭据的特定行为和要求。Most security protocols used for client-server authentication define specific behavior and requirements for supplying credentials for authentication based on whether you are the client or the server. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsSigned As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsSigned { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示使用此流发送的数据是否进行签名。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.

value.span: 如果在传输数据前对其进行签名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据签名有助于保护数据的完整性;也就是说，它可帮助接收方确定数据在传输过程中是否已被篡改。Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LeaveInnerStreamOpen As Boolean
public: property bool LeaveInnerStreamOpen { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取此 用来发送和接收数据的流是否保持打开。

span.span: Gets whether the stream used by this for sending and receiving data has been left open.

value.span: 如果内部流一直保持打开，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the inner stream has been left open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为 `true` ，则在关闭此类的实例后，传递到此类的构造函数的流将不会关闭。When set to `true`, the stream passed to the constructor of this class will not be closed after the instance of this class is closed. 如果设置为 `false` ，则关闭此类的实例也会关闭带下划线的传输流。When set to `false`, closing the instance of this class will also close the underlined transport stream. 此属性的默认值为 `false`。The default value of this property is `false`.
